entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Trois-Rivières
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:24 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Precipitation, 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Trois-Rivières Airport 6:02 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Precipitation
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Dewpoint: -4.2°C
Wind: ENE 18 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with rain changing to rain near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late in the evening then clearing. Fog patches overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
